body:
@aubble No, unless you sign the CLA for legal reasons and submit a change, you're not going to be in the contributors file.

You're indirectly referred to through the issue that's mentioned in that change. I'm happy to mention your name/e-mail address in the change as the person who found the issue if you like. But again, you probably should sign the CLA so that there's no legal issue we the Go team using your e-mail address and name. Thanks.
